TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract IControlAdapter

Attribute.AttributeName: System.Obsolete("The System.Web.Mobile.dll assembly has been deprecated and should no longer be used. For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=157231.")

summary.span: 將介面定義為控制項配置器。

span.span: Defines the interface to a control adapter.

summary.span: 如需如何開發 ASP.NET 行動應用程式的資訊，請參閱 [www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900) 網站。

span.span: For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see the [www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900) Web site.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 所有的控制項配接器必須實作介面。All control adapters must implement the interface. 通常，控制項配接器直接或間接從繼承基底類別，可提供此介面的預設實作。Usually, a control adapter inherits directly or indirectly from the base class, which provides a default implementation of this interface.

permission.span: 用於裝載環境中的作業。

span.span: for operating in a hosted environment.
Demand value: ; Permission value: .

param.span: 如果具現化 (Instantiated) 的樣板必須繫結至可用的資料 (通常發生在第一個要求上)，則傳回 。

span.span: Returns if the instantiated templates must bind to available data (which usually happens on the first request).

param.span: 如果樣板不必繫結至資料，而是依賴檢視狀態將資料填入 (通常發生在後續回傳時)，則傳回 。

span.span: Returns if the templates must not bind to data, and instead rely on view state to fill them in (which usually happens on subsequent postbacks).

summary.span: 由基底類別呼叫，用以建立樣板化 UI。

span.span: Called by base classes to create a templated UI.

span.span: Name of the event.

summary.span: 如果事件已處理，則傳回 。

summary.span: 這個 API 已經過時。

summary.span: 如需如何開發 ASP.NET 行動應用程式的資訊，請參閱 [www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900) 網站。

returns.span: 如果已處理回傳事件則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: if the postback event was handled; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 收到回傳事件通知，檢查事件是否為特定的配接器時，是由控制項呼叫這個方法。This method is called by a control when it receives a postback event notification, to check whether the event is adapter specific. 如果控制項實作並接收回傳的事件，呼叫方法的控制項配接器。If the control implements and receives a postback event, the method of the control adapter is called. 如果事件傳送至控制項可能會不同，視目標裝置而定，必須呼叫這個方法的控制項實作的控制項配接器的方法。If events sent to the control can vary depending on the target device, the control implementation of this method must call the method of the control adapter. 這個方法會傳回`true`或`false`，這表示裝置配接器是否處理事件。This method returns `true` or `false`, indicating whether the device adapter handled the event. 它會傳回`false`預設。It returns `false` by default.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property ItemWeight As Integer
public: property int ItemWeight { int get(); };

summary.span: 存取控制項中單一項目的近似權重。

span.span: Accesses the approximate weight of a single item in the control.

summary.span: 這個 API 已經過時。

summary.span: 如需如何開發 ASP.NET 行動應用程式的資訊，請參閱 [www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900) 網站。

value.span: 控制項中單一項目的近似權重。

span.span: The approximate weight of a single item in the control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 值為`-1`表示必須使用項目的預設權重。A value of `-1` indicates that the default weight for the element must be used. 繼承的類別必須覆寫這個屬性。The inheriting class must override this property. 如需覆寫這個屬性的進一步資訊，請參閱[分頁](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/b4f4c4bc-226b-46ec-ae46-00497a32f4f2)。For further information about overriding this property, see [Pagination](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/b4f4c4bc-226b-46ec-ae46-00497a32f4f2).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 控制項載入其私用檢視狀態時，會呼叫這個方法。This method is called when the control loads its private view state. 裝置配接器可以儲存的配接器特定檢視的控制項。A device adapter can save the adapter-specific view for a control.

param.span: 如果 privateControlData 中的必要物件已變更，而可能引發 事件，則傳回 。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當控制項實作，會呼叫這個方法介面都有它自己叫用方法。This method is called when a control that implements the interface has its own method invoked. > [!NOTE] > 不同的裝置可能會以不同的方式提供資料給呼叫端的伺服器。Different devices might provide their data back to the calling server in different ways. 範例是 WML 和 HTML 報告的方式傳回的結果之間的差異。An example is the difference between how WML and HTML report back the results of a .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可以覆寫此方法以設定裝置特有的屬性。You can override this method to set device-specific properties. 繼承的類別可以覆寫此方法以執行其他工作。Inheriting classes can override this method to perform other tasks. 如果這個方法繼承類別中覆寫時，您必須呼叫基底實作。If this method is overridden in an inheriting class, you must call the base implementation.

summary.span: 當控制項儲存其私用檢視狀態時，會呼叫這個方法。

The newly saved adapter state.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 配接器可以儲存控制項的特定配接器的狀態。An adapter can save adapter-specific state for a control. 如果沒有這類功能是必要的則配接器會傳回`null`(`Nothing`在 Visual Basic 中)。If no such functionality is required, the adapter returns `null` (`Nothing` in Visual Basic).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個屬性用於表單編頁。This property is used for form pagination. 值為`-1`表示必須使用項目的預設權重。A value of `-1` indicates that the default weight for the element must be used. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[分頁支援](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/78f2786d-0b5b-4760-9616-5027357713c2)。For further information, see [Pagination Support](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/78f2786d-0b5b-4760-9616-5027357713c2).
